about_the_game:
Solace

I've lived in Lakeview my whole life, a town where everyone follows the same path, speaks the same way, and wears the same expression. On the surface, everything seems perfect, but lately, I've felt an unsettling change beneath the facade. It's as if the very air is thick with secrets we all pretend not to notice.

Then Joel arrived, a former police officer from somewhere else, searching for his missing daughter. His questions stir something deep within me, something we've all been taught to suppress. He doesn't fit in here, and perhaps that's why he sees what we've been blind to for so long.

Strange things have been happening since he came. Shadows move where they shouldn't, familiar places feel distorted, and time seems to slip through my fingers. The more I observe, the more reality unravels around me. I can't tell if I'm losing my mind or finally seeing the truth hidden beneath our town's pristine surface.

Key Features:

  • Psychological Horror Experience: Step into my shoes as a resident of Lakeview, where enforced conformity masks a sinister reality. Feel the tension rise as I begin to question everything I've ever known.

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Wander through the eerie streets and rooms of Lakeview, where every corner hides a fragment of the unsettling truth. The familiar has become alien, and each step pulls me deeper into the mystery.

  • Intricate Puzzles: Confront complex puzzles that challenge my perception of reality. Solving them is the only way to piece together the fragmented memories and hidden messages that reveal what's truly happening.

  • Immersive Storytelling: Engage with the story through the artifacts of our lives, old letters, cryptic notes, haunting drawings, that expose the cracks in our community's veneer.

  • Realistic Audio and Visuals: Experience Lakeview through high-resolution graphics and immersive soundscapes. The whispers, the haunting melodies, and the distorted visuals all blur the line between reality and illusion.

  • Psychological Depth: Immerse yourself into themes of identity, conformity, and the loss of self. Join me as I grapple with my deteriorating psyche in a place where individuality is a threat.

Goal of the Game:

Uncover the dark secrets lurking beneath Lakeview's perfect surface. Navigate through my unraveling reality, solve the mysteries that bind us all, and confront the malevolent forces at play. As you guide me through my darkest hours, remember: in a place where nothing is as it seems, only in our minds can we find solace.

Prepare to question everything you know about Lakeview. Join me in "Solace," where every discovery brings us closer to a truth that might just set us free, or consume us entirely.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 integrated GPU or Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard macOS-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements should allow for Low/Medium quality settings in 1080p with stable 30-60 FPS. An SSD is recommended.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M2 Pro or Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M2 Pro GPU or Intel UHD Graphics 630 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard macOS-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements should allow for High/Ultra quality settings in 1080p or higher with stable 60 FPS. Optimized for Apple Silicon devices, particularly those with ProMotion displays (supports up to 120Hz adaptive refresh rate). An SSD is highly recommended for faster loading times.
